name: MissileComm4nd
description:
MissileComm4nd is an entry to GameDev. It is a Missile Command clonish game. I used my BubbleTrouble as a layout. I'll propably won't update this game a lot.

I wanted this game to resemble a bit "Missile Command". So pretty simple graphics and all.

Update: a bug fix

  • P - pause
  • spacebar - navigate faster
  • [asd] / mouse - shoot
  • esc - return home
